Requirements You have one hand free, and your target is within reach of that hand

You swipe at your opponent and grab at them.

Make a melee Strike while keeping one hand free. If the Strike hits, you grab the target using your free hand. The creature remains @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.conditionitems.Grabbed]{Grabbed} until the end of your next turn or until it @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.actionsxprpg.Escape]{Escapes}, whichever comes first.
